images.title: Believe — Framed Lettering
images.description: Hand-lettered word 'Believe' framed with intricate pen patterns and leaf motifs in monochrome.

images.title: Twin Birds — Tribal Lines
images.description: Minimal bird forms built with rhythmic hatch lines and geometric feather textures.

images.title: Layered Diamond Mandala
images.description: Concentric diamond composition with stippling, line work and circular accents in black and white.

images.title: Peacock Motif — Folk Patterns
images.description: Playful peacock rendered with bold black shapes and micro-patterns inspired by folk art.

images.title: Lotus Study — Botanical Lines
images.description: A set of lotus blooms and buds, each built from parallel pen lines within a decorative border.

images.title: Abstract Geometry — Flow & Frame
images.description: Dialogue between an organic, flowing texture and a crisp geometric square, balancing fluid and solid forms.

images.title: Window to Hills — Minimal Landscape
images.description: A stark black frame opening to gently undulating hill textures drawn with fine strokes.

images.title: Devi with Trishul — Ornate Portrait
images.description: Half-profile of a goddess with trishul, adorned in rich ornamental line work and traditional motifs.

images.title: Mandala & Dancers Silhouette
images.description: Detailed arc of a mandala above a circle capturing two dance figures in silhouette.

images.title: Radial Wheel — Mosaic Field
images.description: Central radial wheel over a mosaic ground, combining triangles, arcs and fine patterning.

images.title: Leaf Diamond Panel
images.description: Symmetric panel with triangular fields and a central leaf diamond, bordered by repeating curls and circles.
